### [Initializers](/documentation/SwiftUI/Edge/Corner/Style/ExpressibleByIntegerLiteral-Implementations#Initializers)

[`init(integerLiteral: Edge.Corner.Style.IntegerLiteralType)`](/documentation/swiftui/edge/corner/style/init(integerliteral:))Create a fixed corner style with an int value as its corner radius. This is a shorthand of writing `.fixed(value)`.
